channel.title: Transforming
channel.description: i really whant some help.. i whant to add transforming into my satan's isle like command ::cat and u will transform into a cat.. and ::normall and u will be normall again.. please help me. ill rep that one that helps me and if it works..

item.title: Transforming
item.dc:creator: @jonne77 jonne77
item.description:
@jonne77 wrote:


1.

Open client.java and search for:

satantrain
  1. You see this there:
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("satantrain") && (playerRights >= 2)) 
{ // master by i loot i
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
sendMessage("Satan Has Trained U to A Master");
}

  1. click right of the } and press enter 2 times.

  2. ok if you do that add:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME"))
{
npcId = THE NPC ID YOU WANT;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
  1. so u get this:
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("satantrain") && (playerRights >= 2)) 
{ // master by i loot i
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
sendMessage("Satan Has Trained U to A Master");
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME"))
{
npcId = THE NPC ID YOU WANT;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

if you got that add the other. so u get this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("satantrain") && (playerRights >= 2)) 
{ // master by i loot i
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
sendMessage("Satan Has Trained U to A Master");
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME"))
{
npcId = THE NPC ID YOU WANT;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME"))
{
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
  1. To find the npc code go to mopar client and click ‘‘help’’ then click on npc ID’s then search what u want and put the code in
THE NPC ID YOU WANT

On the place where stay:

''COMMANDNAMEHERE''

add you code what you want for ::name

ok if you want cat you get this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cat'')

so u get ::cat

or ::normal

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("normal'')

for ::normal

save and compile and youre doing

Read full topic

item.title: Transforming
item.dc:creator: @souleroo souleroo
item.description:
@souleroo wrote:

does codes doenst help me at all… i dunno where to put them… and where can i find the id of cats and dogs?? and normall…

Read full topic

item.title: Transforming
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME")) { npcId = THE NPC ID YOU WANT; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME")) { isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

BTW, you can’t rep.

EDIT: OR, just use ::pnpc, like in most servers…

Read full topic
